programme.title: Double Target
programme.desc: After several American and British military personnel are killed in suicide attacks throughout Southeast Asia, the U.S. begins to suspect a plot by the Vietnam government. To uncover the truth, the U.S. army calls upon a former commando who is looking for his long-lost son in Vietnam. While his military commanders want to see the commando succeed in his mission, his political overseers have a different set of plans.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a dual role as twins separated at birth who grow up and cross paths. Two brothers, one becomes a famous conductor and pianist in New York, another becomes a racecar driver and bodyguard in Hong Kong. When the conductor travels to Hong Kong to give a concert, the twins get caught up in each other's business, about which they are anything but experts.

programme.title: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: In crime-ridden 1970s New York City, cops Willie and Cy have had enough. Along with other disgruntled people, they decide to take matters into their own hands - only to realize too late that they're in over their heads.

programme.title: Double Target
programme.desc: After several American and British military personnel are killed in suicide attacks throughout Southeast Asia, the U.S. begins to suspect a plot by the Vietnam government. To uncover the truth, the U.S. army calls upon a former commando who is looking for his long-lost son in Vietnam. While his military commanders want to see the commando succeed in his mission, his political overseers have a different set of plans.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a dual role as twins separated at birth who grow up and cross paths. Two brothers, one becomes a famous conductor and pianist in New York, another becomes a racecar driver and bodyguard in Hong Kong. When the conductor travels to Hong Kong to give a concert, the twins get caught up in each other's business, about which they are anything but experts.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Death Game
programme.desc: An affluent businessman allows a spinster and her young sidekick to take shelter in his home during a storm, where they proceed to seduce then torment him.

programme.title: Deadly Impact
programme.desc: An action thriller about an illegal gambling operation that transitions into a deadly gamble for life.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Death Game
programme.desc: An affluent businessman allows a spinster and her young sidekick to take shelter in his home during a storm, where they proceed to seduce then torment him.

programme.title: Deadly Impact
programme.desc: An action thriller about an illegal gambling operation that transitions into a deadly gamble for life.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Death Game
programme.desc: An affluent businessman allows a spinster and her young sidekick to take shelter in his home during a storm, where they proceed to seduce then torment him.

programme.title: Cry in the Wild: The Taking of Peggy Ann
programme.desc: The true story of a young woman's abduction by a deranged ex-convict and the race against the clock to save her--leading to the largest manhunt in Pennsylvanian history.

programme.title: Alto
programme.desc: In this LGBTQ+ romantic comedy, Frankie is a young woman who hates the mafia's influence over her family's life. However, she ends up in the middle of it when she finds a surprise in her car's trunk.

programme.title: The Penthouse
programme.desc: Dinah St. Clair lives a charmed life in a high-rise penthouse. When she is visited by an old childhood friend named Joe Dobson who escaped from a mental ward, things turn into a hostage situation.

programme.title: Decoy
programme.desc: Casey's visit to a girl she arrested and later befriended takes a turn when she discovers the girl's brutal father dead. The girl claims to have shot him, but Casey doesn't believe her.

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: The new comedian at the Fortuna angers his former mobster boss by leaving to work for Lucky. The mobster will do anything to get Jerry back to his club, and kidnaps the comic's wife and Maggie.

programme.title: Harts of the West
programme.desc: When Alison's intimidating powerbroker mother comes to visit, Dave tries to set her up with Jake, touting him as a gentleman. Dave also tries to get rid of a prairie dog named Ralph.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Anthony hires Gunn to locate Marion who is blackmailing him after their affair ended. What he finds leads him to believe that the neighbor may have seen something and was met with an unhappy demise.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Big Marv Pardee, a businessman, hires Nick to find his missing wife who walked out on him after an argument. However, the man's colleagues may know something about her disappearance.

programme.title: Spike Team
programme.desc: Lucky is reminded of his past, & the girls play another practice game against the Roses. Luther and his partner have a new Jewel for the girls to discover.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: When Prince John tries to recruit children for troops, Friar Tuck's student Peter Larkin is the next on the list! Robin Hood must find a way to get Peter's name off the list before he is taken away.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: A series of pirate raids puts Dan Tempest under pressure to catch the perpetrator, while also having to dampen down any rumors his own crew may be behind the attacks.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sir Lancelot
programme.desc: During the Mortaise Fair, a sacred emerald given to Queen Guinevere is mysteriously stolen when a fire breaks loose. Lancelot tries to recover the gem by first questioning the local thieves.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: Nelson discovers a map that shows a way off the plateau, but he has doubts about leaving. The group has to outrun nomads as they follow the route out of the Lost Word.

programme.title: Matt and Jenny
programme.desc: With Adam's help, Matt and Jenny hope to find their lost relatives at a mysterious religious community. They discover evidence in the church that their aunt and uncle had been there.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: After a poker game gone wrong, one of Hammer's gambling buddies is dealt a bad hand and winds up dead. With the cards stacked against him, Hammer thinks a horse race might lead him to the killer.

programme.title: In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: A filmmaker suspends her career in order to prove the innocence of her childhood friend, who has been jailed for the shooting deaths of two police officers. Based on a true story.

programme.title: My Brother's Wife
programme.desc: Barney returns home where he meets his new sister-in-law and ex. Barney recalls the circumstances that had previously kept them apart, namely his father and his fear of commitment.

programme.title: The Last Fling
programme.desc: Phillip meets Gloria, the woman of his dreams, but discovers that she's been dishonest and is getting married in a week. Gloria refuses to call off her wedding, but Jason strives to prove his love.

programme.title: The Audrey Hepburn Story
programme.desc: The biography of one of Hollywood's most famous actresses, Audrey Hepburn. Her story spans from her early childhood living in Nazi-occupied Holland, to making it big in the USA as a movie star.

programme.title: Trapped in a Purple Haze
programme.desc: Max Hanson is a gifted artist, but he likes ice hockey better. When his mother puts him under constant pressure to pursue his artistic career, Max falters and makes a potentially deadly mistake.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane
programme.desc: Long-forgotten child star Baby Jane Hudson neglects her wheelchair-bound sister Blanche's needs, while selfishly spending her money on an alarming amount of liquor.
